tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE project_documents (
  document_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  document_name VARCHAR(255),
  document_content TEXT,
  document_owner VARCHAR(100),
  document_access_level ENUM('public', 'private')
);

CREATE TABLE project_files (
    file_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    file_name VARCHAR(255),
    file_type VARCHAR(50),
    file_size INT,
    file_path VARCHAR(255),
    file_uploaded_at TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES projects(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Projects (
  project_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  project_description TEXT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Documents (
  document_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  project_id UUID REFERENCES Projects(project_id),
  document_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  document_content TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Files (
  file_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  document_id UUID REFERENCES Documents(document_id),
  file_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  file_size INT,
  file_path VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE document_comments (
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    document_id INT,
    commenter_id INT,
    comment_text TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (document_id) REFERENCES project_documents(document_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (commenter_id) REFERENCES team_members(member_id)
);

CREATE TABLE file_attachments (
    file_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    file_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    file_type VARCHAR(50),
    document_id INT,
    uploaded_by INT,
    uploaded_at TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (document_id) REFERENCES project_documents(document_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (uploaded_by) REFERENCES team_members(member_id)
);

create table projects (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name STRING,
  description STRING,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

create table documents (
  doc_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_id INT REFERENCES projects(id),
  document_name STRING,
  document_type STRING,
  created_by STRING,
  created_at TIMESTAMP
);

create table file_storage (
  file_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_id INT REFERENCES projects(id),
  file_name STRING,
  file_path STRING,
  uploaded_by STRING,
  uploaded_at TIMESTAMP
);
